data.title: Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s Complete Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have a love story that spans decades. They first met in 1998 on the set of That '70s Show. Here's all about their relationship
data.text:
Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher are two of the most beloved figures in Hollywood. Known for their successful careers and charming on-screen chemistry, their relationship has captivated fans and media alike.

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have a love story that spans decades. They first met in 1998 on the set of That ’70s Show. Though they were a favorite pair on screen, it took years for them to get together in real life. Nearly 25 years later, they returned to their roles in Netflix’s That ’90s Show.

Now, they are happily married with two kids and have successful acting careers. In March 2022, they helped raise over $30 million for Ukrainian refugees. Their journey from on-screen chemistry to real-life romance is inspiring.

Recently Ashton Kutcher revealed that he needed a bit of “liquid courage” to tell Mila Kunis “I love you” for the first time. The moment occurred when Kutcher showed up at Kunis’s house at 2 AM, after having a little too much tequila. He was inspired by the song “You and Tequila” by Kenny Chesney.

Most recently, Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis were seen with their two children, Wyatt and Dimitri, at a WNBA game in Los Angeles on May 24, 2024. The family attended the game between the Indiana Fever and the Los Angeles Sparks, where they cheered on the players and posed for photos with Indiana star Caitlin Clark.

From on-screen chemistry to their real-life romance, here’s a look at Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis’ relationship timeline.

In July 2024, Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher shared some public displays of affection (PDA) at Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour concert in London. The couple, who attended the concert with their children, caught the attention of fans when Mila playfully pretended to propose to Ashton during the performance of “Love Story.

A Timeline of Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s Relationship

This timeline highlights the major milestones in Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s relationship, showcasing the key events that have defined their journey together. Here is a detailed timeline of their relationship in tabular form:

Date

Event

Kunis and Kutcher meet on the set of That ’70s Show (1998 – 2012)

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher first met in 1998 when they were cast in the popular sitcom “That ’70s Show”. Kunis was only 14 years old at the time, while Kutcher was 20. Their characters, Jackie Burkhart and Michael Kelso had an on-again, off-again relationship throughout the series, showcasing undeniable chemistry. Despite this, their off-screen relationship remained strictly platonic for many years.

Kunis has often shared that her first kiss ever was with Kutcher on the show, adding a nostalgic layer to their eventual real-life romance. Little did they know that their on-screen partnership would lay the foundation for a lifelong bond.

Kutcher marries actress Demi Moore (2005)

Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore were married from 2005 to 2013. They met in 2003 and quickly became one of Hollywood’s most talked-about couples, partly due to their 15-year age difference. Despite their high-profile relationship, they faced significant challenges, including a miscarriage that deeply affected both of them. Moore and Kutcher were very open about their relationship on social media, often sharing affectionate posts on Twitter.

Mila Kunis and then-boyfriend Macaulay Culkin break up (2011)

Mila Kunis and Macaulay Culkin ended their eight-year relationship in January 2011. The couple, who had been dating since 2002, kept their relationship mostly private. Kunis’ representative confirmed the breakup, stating that it was amicable and they remained close friends. The split was kept quiet initially to avoid overshadowing Kunis’ promotional work for her film “Black Swan.”

Ashton and Mila reunite at an awards show (2012)

In April 2012, rumors began to surface about Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s relationship after they were spotted spending time together. By July 2012, the couple made their relationship public with a romantic outing in Los Angeles. Their public appearances and affectionate demeanor confirmed their status as a couple, delighting fans who had long hoped for their on-screen romance to become a reality.

Kunis and Kutcher get engaged (February 2014)

In february 2014, Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher got engaged. Kunis was spotted wearing a diamond ring, confirming their engagement. Kutcher had asked Kunis’ father for his blessing around Christmas 2013. This engagement followed Kutcher’s finalized divorce from Demi Moore in November 2013​.

The couple welcomes their first child (October 2014)

In october 2014, The couple welcomed their first child, Wyatt Isabelle Kutcher. Kunis confirmed her pregnancy on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, revealing cravings for sauerkraut and pickles. Wyatt was born at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles

They finally tie the knot (July 2015)

Kunis and Kutcher tied the knot in a private, low-key ceremony at The Secret Garden at Parrish Ranch in Oak Glen, California. The property was transformed into “Camp Kuku,” featuring outdoor activities and tents for a luxurious camping experience.

They welcome their second child (2016)

The couple welcomed their second child, Dimitri Portwood Kutcher. Kutcher joked on Late Night with Seth Meyers about initially hoping for another girl but being thrilled to have a son​.

Kunis and Kutcher go red carpet official (December 2017)

Kunis and Kutcher made their red carpet debut together at the Breakthrough Prize Awards at the NASA Ames Research Center. This marked their first major public appearance as a couple since their relationship began​.

Kunis and Kutcher act together once again (February 2021)

The pair starred together in a Super Bowl ad for Cheetos, a project that emerged during the COVID-19 pandemic quarantine. Kunis explained they took the opportunity to enjoy a brief escape from their lockdown routine with their children.

The pair gets ready for the That ’70s Show spin-off, That ’90s Show (2022)

They reprised their roles as Jackie Burkhart and Michael Kelso for the That ’70s Show spin-off, That ’90s Show. Their return to these iconic roles excited long-time fans of the original series​.

Kutcher says he’s the “luckiest man alive (June 2023)

Ahead of their eighth wedding anniversary, Kutcher shared a heartfelt tribute to Kunis on Instagram, captioning a photo of her with “I’m the Luckiest man alive. #gratitude”​.

Kunis shared a cute story about her and Kutcher at their children’s daycare (April 2024)

Kunis shared a charming story about their experiences at their children’s daycare, giving fans a glimpse into their family life.

May 2024: Kutcher and Kunis were spotted at brunch in West Hollywood

The couple was spotted enjoying brunch in West Hollywood, showcasing their continuing affection and strong bond as a couple​.

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s Relationship in the Public Eye

Throughout their relationship, Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have navigated the challenges of being in the public eye with grace and dignity. Despite the constant media scrutiny, they have managed to maintain a strong and loving relationship, often speaking about the importance of privacy and mutual respect.

Their ability to balance their public personas with their private lives has been a key factor in their enduring relationship. Fans admire their authenticity and the way they have handled the pressures of fame while staying true to themselves.

Impact on Their Careers

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s relationship has had a positive impact on their careers. Their mutual support and admiration have allowed them to pursue their professional goals while maintaining a strong personal bond. Their collaborations and joint appearances have further solidified their status as a power couple in Hollywood.

Their relationship serves as an example of how a strong partnership can enhance both personal and professional lives. Kunis and Kutcher’s ability to navigate the complexities of fame and maintain a successful marriage has made them an inspiration to many.

Conclusion

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have built a strong and loving relationship over the years, becoming one of Hollywood’s favorite couples. From their early days as co-stars on That ’70s Show to their engagement in February 2014, and the birth of their children, Wyatt Isabelle in October 2014 and Dimitri Portwood in November 2016, they have shared many significant moments together​.

Their journey continued with a private wedding in July 2015 and several public appearances, including their red carpet debut in December 2017 and a joint project for a Super Bowl ad in February 2021​​. Despite their busy careers, they have made time for each other and their family, showing their commitment to maintaining a strong and supportive relationship.

A Complete Timeline of Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s Relationship – FAQs

When did Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher first meet?

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher first met in 1998 on the set of “That ’70s Show”.

When did Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher make their relationship public?

They made their relationship public with a romantic outing in Los Angeles in July 2012.

When did Ashton Kutcher propose to Mila Kunis?

Ashton Kutcher proposed to Mila Kunis in February 2014.

How many children do Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have?

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher have two children: Wyatt Isabelle Kutcher and Dimitri Portwood Kutcher.

When did Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher get married?

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher got married on July 4, 2015.

What significant event did they address in 2019?

In 2019, they addressed breakup rumors with a humorous social media video.

What joint venture did they launch in 2022?

In 2022, Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher launched a joint venture for sustainable farming.
